channel.title: Bangladesh on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Bangladesh on TechnoStreet

item.title: Bangladesh 82-2 on 1st morning of 2nd test against India
item.description: Bangladesh 82-2 on 1st morning of 2nd test against India Following its 188-run defeat in the first test at Chattogram, Bangladesh made two changes with batter Mominul Haque and fast bowler Taskin Ahmed replacing Yasir Ali and Ebadot Hossain.

item.title: Mehdi Hasan’s Intimidatory Batting – Bangladesh Defeat India in ‘Tik Tik’
item.description: Mehdi Hasan’s Intimidatory Batting – Bangladesh Defeat India in ‘Tik Tik’ Bangladesh won the match against India by 1 wicket.
